author: iain.bell
title: Medical Industry Credential System
description: Doctors are required to provide a range of government agency proofs of certification prior to being accepted for employment at any hospital.
solution: Our solution interfaces with govt systems and retrieves this data to a DiD; automatically presenting it in support of user job application.
experience:
Team of 3 :
- Surgeon working in Australia
- Architect/dev 25+ yrs enterprise software. ADA holder since 2019.  
- Business Developer
